snippet: There are politicians, business leaders and entertainers who seem perfectly capable of giving speeches, leading groups or performing in public but who self-identify as shy.
abstract: Many politicians, business leaders and entertainers who are give speeches, lead groups or perform in public self-identify as shy; entertainer Chris Rock is among the secretly shy, those the public would never suspect of reticence.
lead_paragraph: There are politicians, business leaders and entertainers who seem perfectly capable of giving speeches, leading groups or performing in public but who self-identify as shy.

headline.main: The Spotlight Dims and Shyness Sets In
headline.print_headline: The Spotlight Dims and Shyness Sets In
